eldritchvoid.modulesystem.name: Eldritch Void Module System
eldritchvoid.modulesystem.tooltip: Manage and configure all Eldritch Void modules
module.eldritchvoid.voidalchemy.descript: Manipulate the essence of the void to create powerful compounds
Craft powerful items using the heat of obsidian forges
module.eldritchvoid.eldritchartifacts.de: Discover ancient artifacts with mysterious powers
module.eldritchvoid.voidcorruption.descr: The void spreads its influence throughout the world
module.eldritchvoid.eldritcharcana.descr: Study forbidden knowledge and perform arcane research
module.eldritchvoid.obsidianconstructs.d: Create autonomous constructs to automate tasks
module.eldritchvoid.eldritchdimensions.d: Travel to otherworldly dimensions filled with strange wonders
module.eldritchvoid.voidtech.description: Harness void energy to power machinery
module.eldritchvoid.voidcultists.descrip: Interact with NPCs who worship the void
